name: Tims Pizza Flitzer
description:
Compete in the ultimate time-trial by making and delivering pizzas in "Tims Pizza Flitzer" (it's german for "Tim's pizza speedster")

It is my first game (the first that I didn't abandon in the first day or so) and I hope it is somewhat fun!
